titleStmt.title: A description of the city of Aeth and situation of the castle, with an exact journal of the siege, begun the 17th of May new stile, till the capitulation on the 5th of June, and surrender on the 7th together with the new fortifications made by the French, 1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Croom at the Blue-Ball near Bridgewall-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
